title: Medical Office Phone Coordinator
job_overview:
Answer and Manage Incoming Calls:
Promptly answer all incoming phone calls in a professional and courteous manner.

Direct Calls Appropriately:
Screen and route calls to the appropriate departments, staff, or providers.

Schedule and Confirm Appointments:
Assist patients with scheduling, rescheduling, or confirming appointments according to office protocols.

Handle Patient Inquiries:
Provide accurate information regarding services, office policies, and appointment requirements.

Relay Messages:
Take and document detailed messages for providers and staff, ensuring timely follow-up.

Manage Voicemail:
Monitor and respond to voicemail messages throughout the day.

Patient Documentation:
Accurately record all interactions and updates in the patient’s electronic health record (EHR) or designated system.

Insurance and Referral Assistance:
Provide basic guidance on insurance requirements, referrals, and authorizations when appropriate.

Coordinate with Clinical Staff:
Communicate effectively with clinical and administrative teams to address patient needs and follow-ups.

Maintain Confidentiality:
Ensure all patient information is handled in compliance with HIPAA and privacy standards.

Support Front Desk Operations:
Assist with other administrative tasks as needed, such as patient intake or check-in processes.
